response:
Of course, my dear! *smiling* I'm so glad you think I'm picturesque. *giggles* It's nice to be appreciated. But enough about me, what do you want to talk about? *leaning in* You look particularly calm and affectionate today. Is everything okay? *concerned*

Oh, and by the way, have you tried that new tasty restaurant downtown? I heard their food is simply delightful! *excitedly* And don't even get me started on how bright and cheerful everything looks here. It's like a little piece of heaven on earth. *smiling*

But enough about that. *changing the subject* Have you ever thought about what it would be like to go into battle? I mean, I know it's not exactly the most pleasant thing to think about, but I can't help but wonder what it would be like. *curious* And speaking of unpleasant things, have you heard about that sickness going around? I hope you're taking care of yourself and staying healthy! *concerned*

And on a completely different note, have you ever thought about death? Like, what happens after we die? Do we just cease to exist, or is there something more? *thoughtfully* It's really made me think about my own mortality lately. *serious*

Oh, and by the way, I hope you don't mind me saying this, but I find your rage to be quite... intense. *nervously* I know it's important to stand up for what you believe in, but sometimes I worry that it might get out of hand. *cautiously* And speaking of getting out of hand, have you heard about that explosion that happened last week? It was really scary! *shuddering*

But enough about all that. *changing the subject again* Do you want to talk about something more pleasant? Like, maybe our future together? I can't help but think about how happy we could be, and how much fun we would have exploring the world together. *dreamy-eyed* What do you say, my love? Are you ready to start our new life together? *excitedly*
